Articles.Content: 409: 5 things to do now that clickbait has been invented
410: the thread is locked because a newer one exists.

410: the thread is locked because a newer one exists.

Ok, this is it, this thread has been inactive for about a month now, some call this Necromancing, I call this being ridiculous. First of all, all posts have to retain to the (dead) game. Second of all, posts like these is what caused the KH "arms race" the constant thread posting of KH 3, KH 3 (2), KH RM, KH X, And KH Rb. So please refrain from causing conflict. (And yes I do agree that this does need to be closed).
